title: CSE temporarily halts regular trading as shares plunge
body_lines: The Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) has halted regular trading for 30 minutes at 10.32 a.m. this morning (04).
This is due to the S&P SL20 Index dropping over over 5% from the previous close.
The trading halt is to be lifted at 11.02 a.m. at the stock market.
